testcase.name: test

error.message: The TCP/IP connection to the host 192.168.5.148//sqlexpress, port 1024 has failed. Error: "null. Verify the connection properties, check that an instance of SQL Server is running on the host and accepting TCP/IP connections at the port, and that no firewall is blocking TCP connections to the port.".
